# metronome_v1_customer_plans (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "metronome_v1_customer_plans" "example_v1_customer_plans" {
  customer_id = "d7abd0cd-4ae9-4db7-8676-e986a4ebd8dc"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `customer_id` (String)
